appStages.name: Introduction
Demand-Time-Series-Analysis
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eDemand Time Series Analysis\r\n\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eThis section presents exploratory visualizations of historical sales patterns across stores and items.\r\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eTimes Series Visuals\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eTrain-Test Split\r\nVisualizes how the dataset is divided into training and testing sets for time-based modeling.\r\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eTime-Series Decomposition: Sales are stable overall, with a clear yearly seasonal cycle and some random fluctuations\r\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Sales are right-skewed, with many low values and a few high outliers; log-transform can normalize them.\r\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eSales Over Time.\r\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eMonthly and weekly Trends.\r\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,

      "type": "htmlelement",
